/*
 * drawingContest.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: Jan 11, 2015
 *      Author: abhinay
 */
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	vector<int> kidHeights , pencilHeights;
	int N , K , i , tmp , sum , j = 1;
	cin >> N;
	while(N > 0){
		cin >> K;
		sum = 0;
		for(i = 0 ; i < K ; i++){
			cin >> tmp;
			kidHeights.push_back(tmp);
		}
		for(i = 0 ; i < K ; i++){
			cin >> tmp;
			pencilHeights.push_back(tmp);
		}
		std::sort(kidHeights.begin() , kidHeights.end());
		std::sort(pencilHeights.begin() , pencilHeights.end());
		for(i = 0 ; i < K ;i++){
			sum += abs(pencilHeights[i]- kidHeights[i]);
		}
		cout<<"Case"<< " " << j <<":" <<" "<<sum<<"\n";
		j++;
		kidHeights.clear();
		pencilHeights.clear();
		N--;
	}
	return 0;
}
